snippet: Counting Isle Royale moose can be a tedious task that requires great dedication. But each moose has its own life story.
abstract: Counting Isle Royale moose can be a tedious task that requires great dedication. But each moose has its own life story.
lead_paragraph: John Vucetich, a wildlife ecologist from Michigan Technological University, leads the wolf-moose Winter Study at Isle Royale National Park.
